name: Skolios
description:
Cora wakes up in the main hall of an abandoned train station. She has no memory of what happened before she woke up and an ominous silence is surrounding the area. It’s foggy outside the windows, the doors are locked and something disastrous seems to overtake the building… There are others, lost and confused like Cora. And there are also the shadows and deformed creatures lurking and crawling in the dark, waiting to draw them into the deep. Will she be able to find a way out?

„Skolios“ is a slow-paced psychological horrorgame made with the RPG-Maker 2003. It is heavily inspired by nightmares and the eerie yet beautiful atmosphere of lost places as well as some classic horror games. Skolios is free to play.

Features:
-Choices and random events that change the game experience
-Some unique selfmade graphics and soundeffects
-Changing perspectives (as in classic horror games like Resident Evil or Silent Hill)
-Saverooms (there are a few savespots outside saverooms, but no autosaves)
-Quick Time Events
-no combat (if an enemy hits you - it's Game Over. Run, hide or avoid enemies if possible)

Trigger Warning:
This game contains some sensitive topics like:
Bullying, Suicide, Depression, Identity Disorders.

This game is free to play. Selling, borrowing or modifying is not allowed.
Also avaiable in german on https://skoliosthegame.wordpress.com/
